query: How do I reset my password?
retrieved_contexts: To reset your password, click 'Forgot Password' on the login page. Enter your email address, and we'll send you a password reset link. The link expires after 24 hours.
For security, we require passwords to be at least 8 characters with one uppercase letter, one number, and one special character.
If you don't receive the reset email within 5 minutes, check your spam folder or contact support at support@company.com
response: Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page, enter your email, and we'll send you a reset link. Check spam if you don't see it in 5 minutes. The link is valid for 24 hours.
ground_truth: Use forgot password feature on login page, receive email link valid for 24 hours

query: My order hasn't arrived yet. Where is it?
retrieved_contexts: Track your order using the tracking number sent to your email. Visit our tracking page and enter your order number or tracking ID.
Standard shipping takes 3-5 business days. Expedited shipping is 1-2 business days. Orders ship within 24 hours of placement.
If tracking shows 'delivered' but you haven't received it, check with neighbors or building management. Contact us within 48 hours to file a claim.
response: You can track your order using the tracking number we emailed you. Standard shipping takes 3-5 business days. If it shows delivered but you don't have it, check with neighbors and contact us within 48 hours.
ground_truth: Use tracking number from email, standard delivery is 3-5 days, contact support if issues

retrieved_contexts: You can cancel your subscription anytime from your account settings. Go to Billing > Manage Subscription > Cancel. No cancellation fees apply.
After cancellation, you'll retain access until the end of your current billing period. No refunds for partial months.
To reactivate, simply visit the subscription page and choose a plan. Your previous data and settings will be restored.
response: Yes, you can cancel anytime from Account Settings > Billing > Manage Subscription. No fees. You keep access until your current period ends, but there's no refund for partial months.
ground_truth: Cancel anytime from account settings, no fees, access until period ends

retrieved_contexts: We use Stripe for payment processing, which is PCI-DSS Level 1 certified. We never store your credit card number on our servers.
All transactions are encrypted using 256-bit SSL encryption. Your payment data is tokenized and stored securely by our payment processor.
We also offer PayPal and Apple Pay as alternative payment methods for added security and convenience.
response: Yes, very secure. We use Stripe (PCI-DSS certified) and never store your card number. All transactions use 256-bit SSL encryption. We also support PayPal and Apple Pay.
ground_truth: PCI-DSS certified via Stripe, never store card data, SSL encrypted

query: The app keeps crashing when I try to upload photos. What should I do?
retrieved_contexts: If the app crashes during uploads, try these steps: 1) Clear the app cache in settings, 2) Restart the app, 3) Check for app updates in your app store.
Large photo files (over 10MB) may cause issues on slower connections. Try compressing images before uploading or use Wi-Fi instead of mobile data.
If the problem persists, please email support@company.com with your device model and OS version. Include the photo file size if possible.
response: Try these steps: Clear app cache, restart the app, and check for updates. If photos are over 10MB, compress them or use Wi-Fi. Still having issues? Email support@company.com with your device details.
ground_truth: Clear cache, restart, update app, compress large photos, contact support if persists
